Summary Note:
The RM first met Martina Ginevra Landi at a luxury car show in Rome. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Martina Ginevra Landi is a seasoned professional with over 24 years of experience.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Martina Ginevra Landi has been happily married to  Marino since 2010. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Martina obtained her secondary school diploma from Istituto Magistrale Statale Maria Gaetana Agnesi Genova in 1997.
Martina pursued higher education at Superior School of Advanced Studies of Pisa, graduating in 2000.
Occupation History:
Martina Ginevra Landi is a 47 year old Senior Designer from Italy. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
In 2001, Martina Ginevra Landi started working as a Assistant Designer at Gucci S.p.A., marking the beginning of her successful career.
She then transitioned to Prada S.p.A. as a Senior Designer, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2004 to 2025.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 250000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She owns villa in Brescia, where she resides. It is worth 2030000 EUR.

She purchased house in Verona, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 1540000 EUR.

Following the passing of her mother, a successful Hedge Fund Manager, she received an inheritance of 6320000 EUR in 2007, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: In summary, Martina has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
